name: Flowers For Me
description:
STORY Flowers For Me is a horror game. A girl named Lora went to pick flowers for her dad. Dad told her to come home before night fall. Night came and Lora was not home. Dad tries to find her, but on the way he finds out that she has been kidnapped by some cult that wants to sacrifice her. Will she stay alive or will she be dead? You can only find out if you play Flowers For Me. CONTROLS

W, A, S, D is for moving player. F is to turn on the flashlight. A left mouse click is to shoot. R is to reload.

TIPS

- Rocks mark path, follow little rocks on road and you can not get lost

- If you want to read a note, you need to get close to it

- Aim for the head cause it deals much more damage
